title: 25 Years of Stories: A Love Note to Salman Rushdie
description:
This week, we play a story from Salman Rushdie, a treasured member of The Moth family. This episode is hosted by Jon Goode.

Host: Jon Goode

Storyteller: Salman Rushdie
itunes:subtitle: A tribute to Freedom of Speech
itunes:author: The Moth
